attributes.action: Issue new national Insurance numbers to all those affected by the child benefit 'missing data disc' fiasco
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of us are now exposed to the possibility of ID fraud since the HRMC 'lost' discs holding the personal data of every child benefit claimant in the UK. This government MUST NOW protect its citizens from the risk of ID fraud and issue new National Insurance numbers to all those affected by the incompetence of the HRMC!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
